name: Dodge beta 1
description:
a game that you drag the circle around to dodge obstacle. please play. There is 8 level in this game complete them all to have fun. also please play in full screen with 1920 x 1080.
This is a game made during a game jam called "Funni Jam" where you tried to create as funny as possible game. but since I have no idea how to be funny I created a normal game.
